author: myrnavl
msg: DERBY-2242 (partial) - convert tests for getBestRowIdentifier from bestrowidentifier.sql and metadata.java - step 1; add to DatabaseMetaDataTest.

author: woonsan
msg: Fixed the the problem when commonj work manager was used to render portlets.
Before we have CommonjWorkerMonitorImpl, we just put some objects into a map to be passed into a
However, now we put some objects into the map and get some from the map because we need keep
So, the map object need to be a synchronized map for this case.

author: kmenard
msg: Fixed WWW-263: cdbgen (DbGeneratorTask) must support classpath and classpathref.
Also added the classpath and classpathref attributes to the other three ant tasks.
